Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to annual earnings limitations for retired police officers
Summary: Limits annual earnings for retired police officers that work as school security officers to $50,000.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to annual earnings limitations for retired police officers
